meta.keywords: liver syrup, liver medicine, Pundra, Pundra liver syrup, ayurvedic
meta.description: Liverin syrup is an Ayurvedic medicine which helps in improving digestion, stimulating appetite, prevents fatty infiltration in the liver.

pageTitle: Ayurvedic Medicine for Liver | Liverin Syrup

productDescription.line1: Liverin syrup is an Ayurvedic medicine which helps in improving digestion, stimulating appetite, prevents fatty infiltration in the liver.
productDescription.line2: It also protects the liver from viral hepatitis and prevents from alcoholic liver and drug-induced Hepatoxicity It is a herbal based syrup that is fortified with Andrographis Paniculate, Tephrosia Perurea & other powerful scientifically proven herbs. It is 100% Ayurvedic and safe

ingredient.title: Ingredients
ingredient.information: Each teaspoonful (10ml) of Liverin syrup contains extract derived from:

dosage.title: Dosage
availableDosages: Children: 1 teaspoon 3-4 times a day before meal
Adults: 2 teaspoon 3-4 times a day before meal
